snippet: After a meeting with United States Senator Max Baucus, Singapore’s foreign minister said his country would investigate the death of Shane Todd, who police say died of a suicide.
abstract: Singapore's Foreign Min K Shanmugam pledges to investigate death of American engineer Shane Todd, whose family rejects finding by police that his death was caused by suicide.
lead_paragraph: After a meeting with United States Senator Max Baucus, Singapore’s foreign minister said his country would investigate the death of Shane Todd, who police say died of a suicide.

headline.seo: Singapore Pledges Inquiry Into Death of Shane Todd, an American Engineer
headline.main: Singapore Pledges Inquiry Into Death of an American Engineer
headline.print_headline: Singapore Pledges Inquiry Into Death of an American Engineer
